plugins.name: コーディング計算ツール
plugins.description:
レイヤーから取得できる数値をコーディングで使用する数値に自動計算します。

あなたのコーディング作業が少しでも楽になりますように。


【行間の倍率変換】

テキストレイヤーを選択すると文字サイズと行間を取得して倍率値に変換します。

以下の場合は計算できません。

  1. 行間がautoの場合
  2. オートレイアウト、グループ化レイヤーを選択
  3. テキストレイヤー以外のレイヤーを選択


【単位変換】

px値を別の単位に変換します。

各単位共通でテキストレイヤーなら文字サイズを取得し、その他のレイヤーなら横幅を取得しますが、単位ごとに連動するフィールドが異なります。


em：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」が変動します。

rem：

レイヤーを選択すると「変換したいpx値」が変動します。基準値は16が初期値になります。

%：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」が変動します。

vw：

レイヤーを選択すると「基準値」と「変換したいpx値」が変動します。

「基準値」は一番外側のフレームサイズになり、「変換したいpx値」は選択中のレイヤーの数値になります。


【clamp関数】

レイヤーから数値を取得して、clamp(最小値, 推奨値, 最大値)の形式で出力します。

フレームサイズが700px以下の場合は最小値と最小画面幅が、701px以上だと最大値と最大画面幅が連動し、レイヤーから数値を取得します。emとremは基準値も設定できます。


【その他共通仕様】

  1. 結果をクリックでクリップボードにコピーします。
  2. 「値変動」をOFFにするとレイヤーからの取得をやめ、普通の計算機になります。
  3. 出力結果が小数点になる場合は少数第3位まで表示します。
plugins.tagline: コーディングで使用する数値に変換する補助ツール。

plugins.name: Fijira
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflow and eliminate the gap between design and project management with Fijira. This powerful plugin seamlessly connects your Figma designs directly to your Jira tickets, ensuring that your development team always has access to the latest frames, feedback, and design specifications.


Stop wasting time manually exporting assets and pasting links. With Fijira, you can create detailed Jira comments, update ticket statuses, and link specific Figma frames directly from within your design file.


Key Features:


One-Click Jira Comments: Create rich, formatted comments in Jira tickets directly from Figma.

Automatic Frame Linking: Automatically attach a link to your selected Figma frame. If no frame is selected, you have the option to paste a link manually.

Status Updates: View available transitions and update the status of your Jira tickets without leaving Figma.

Simple Markdown Editor: Format your comments with bold, italics, lists, and links to keep your communication clear and organized.

Secure & Private: Your Jira credentials are saved securely in your local Figma storage and are never exposed. All communication happens through a secure, private proxy server.

Easy Setup: A simple, one-time setup for your Jira domain, email, and API token gets you started in minutes.

How to Use:


Run the Plugin: Open Fijira from the plugins menu.

Enter Your Settings: In the settings view, enter your Jira domain (e.g., your-company.atlassian.net), your Jira account email, and a valid Jira API token.

Select a Frame (Optional): Select a single frame in your Figma file that you want to link.

Fill in Commit Details: In the commit view, enter a commit title, a detailed description (using the markdown editor!), and the target Jira issue key (e.g., PROJ-123).

Update Status (Optional): Choose a new status for your Jira ticket from the dropdown menu.

Commit! Click "Commit & Update Jira". Fijira will post your comment, link, and status change to the specified Jira ticket and create a new version in your Figma file history.

Say goodbye to context switching and hello to a more efficient workflow with Fijira!
plugins.tagline: Sync your Figma designs with Jira issue, seamlessly.

plugins.name: Auto Layout Remover
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Remover helps you quickly clean up messy Figma files and make them easier to edit or prototype.


When to use it:

  1. You want to redesign freely. If your design is full of auto layouts and deeply nested frames, and you just want to move things around without dealing with layout constraints — this plugin flattens everything so you can edit with ease.
  2. You’re building an interactive prototype. Auto layouts often create layers and nesting that block or overlap each other. This plugin helps you clean the structure fast — so you can bring the right blocks to the top and avoid layout issues.


What it does:

  1. Turns off all auto layouts, keeping objects in place
  2. Ungroups frames and groups without visible styles (no fill, no stroke, or hidden)
  3. Deletes hidden layers and empty frames
  4. Leaves instances and styled frames untouched
  5. Makes your file flat, clean, and easy to work with
plugins.tagline: Remove all auto layouts, empty frames, and groups in one click.

plugins.name: WCAG Contrast Auditor
plugins.description:
WCAG Contrast Auditor is a Figma plugin that helps you guarantee your text meets WCAG accessibility standards—no manual math or guesswork required. Simply:


  1. Select the text layers you want to check (or select a parent frame to audit everything inside).
  2. Pick your background color and target WCAG level (AA or AAA).
  3. Run Audit to instantly see how many layers pass or fail the chosen contrast threshold.


Key benefits:

  1. Automated compliance checks: Scan dozens or hundreds of text layers in seconds.
  2. Flexible thresholds: Choose between WCAG AA (4.5:1) or AAA (7:1) contrast ratios.
  3. Lightweight & zero setup: No external dependencies—just install and go.
  4. Actionable results: Get a quick pass/fail count so you know exactly where to focus your fixes.


Whether you’re building design systems, client deliverables, or internal UIs, WCAG Contrast Auditor makes accessibility a seamless, one-click step in your workflow. Ensure every color combination is compliant—and ship more inclusive products today!
plugins.tagline: Spot & Fix WCAG Contrast Issues Instantly.

plugins.name: Layer Assistant
plugins.description:
Layer Assistant is a Figma plugin for efficient layer management, featuring:

✅ Expand/Collapse – Batch expand or collapse layer structures

✅ Show/Hide – Quickly toggle layer visibility

✅ Remove Hidden Layers – Clean up all invisible layers

✅ AutoLayout Conversion – Convert AutoLayout containers to basic Frames

✅ Remove Frames/Groups – Delete empty containers while preserving content


🌟 Key Benefits

🌐 Bilingual UI (EN/CN) - Switch languages instantly

⚡ Visual Operation - No need to remember shortcuts

🛠️ Non-destructive Processing - Preserves layer properties


✅ 展开/折叠 – 批量展开或折叠图层结构

✅ 显示/隐藏 – 快速显示或隐藏所选图层

✅ 删除隐藏图层 – 清理画布上所有不可见图层

✅ AutoLayout 转换 – 将 AutoLayout 批量转为普通 Frame

✅ 移除 Frame/Group – 删除冗余容器，保留内容


🌟 独家优势

🌐 双语支持 (中/英) - 一键切换语言

⚡ 可视化操作 - 无需记忆复杂快捷键

🛠️ 无损处理 - 智能保留图层属性

plugins.name: Screenshot to 100%
plugins.description:
The plugin quickly scales selected images to 100% of their real screenshot size in one click.


On Windows, if your display scaling (for example, 175%) is set above 100%, screenshots are captured at a larger size and look incorrect when pasted into Figma. This plugin helps you downscale screenshots so they appear correctly in Figma.


To use the plugin properly, set the same scale value in the plugin settings as in your Windows display settings.

accepted.name: Nik M
accepted.description: UX/UI/Product designer with more than 10+ years exp.

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly scales selected images to 100% of their real screenshot size in one click.

UnfigShadow - Advanced Shadowing for Figma is a professional plugin that brings realistic, multi-layered shadow generation into your design workflow. plugins.name: MoroccanMock
plugins.description:
Design layouts more efficiently by pulling text strings, images, and cultural assets from a unique Moroccan-inspired palette. "moroccanMock" lets you create custom Moroccan-themed content and share it with other Figma users. Collaboration has never been easier!


Content:

Browse or search content to find a collection of Moroccan-inspired text strings, images, and icons. Struggling to find the perfect content? You can create your own text and image assets by using Add.


Add:

Create text categories and populate them with your own text strings. You can also upload up to 20 PNGs or JPEGs to create image content. As a creator, you may choose to share it publicly or keep it private. When you create content, it is automatically pinned to the Home Screen for quick access (signed-in users only).


Customize Your Home Screen:

Optimize your workflow by pinning the content that you use most to your home screen. Apply 1-click access to any content type with the switch of a toggle (signed-in users only). Drag and drop items on your home screen to suit your preferences.


How to use moroccanMock:

Find content:

Access saved content from your Home Screen or navigate through the tabs to search or browse content. Pin it for ease of access to your home screen.


Applying text content:

Select one or more text layers in your design to apply strings individually or apply them all. Use the original order provided or choose an order from the drop-down menu.


Applying image content:

Select one or more image layers or frames in your design, then apply the images individually or apply them all in random order.


Applying icon content:

Browse the collection or use the search bar to find a Moroccan icon. Click on the icon or drag and drop it into your design. You can also adjust the icon size to scale as needed.


Creating text and image content:

Navigate to the Add tab, click Add, and select content type. Provide a Title relevant to your content. Set your content to Public or Private. See the terms and conditions regarding usage and rights.


Anwar Bahou

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/bahouanwar
plugins.tagline: Bring Moroccan Culture to Your Designs – Instantly

As a creator, you may choose to share it publicly or keep it private. When you create content, it is automatically pinned to the Home Screen for quick access (signed-in users only).


Customize Your Home Screen:

Optimize your workflow by pinning the content that you use most to your home screen. Apply 1-click access to any content type with the switch of a toggle (signed-in users only). Drag and drop items on your home screen to suit your preferences.


How to use moroccanMock:

Find content:

Access saved content from your Home Screen or navigate through the tabs to search or browse content. Pin it for ease of access to your home screen.


Applying text content:

Select one or more text layers in your design to apply strings individually or apply them all. Use the original order provided or choose an order from the drop-down menu.


Applying image content:

Select one or more image layers or frames in your design, then apply the images individually or apply them all in random order.


Applying icon content:

Browse the collection or use the search bar to find a Moroccan icon. Click on the icon or drag and drop it into your design. You can also adjust the icon size to scale as needed.


Creating text and image content:

Navigate to the Add tab, click Add, and select content type. Provide a Title relevant to your content. Set your content to Public or Private. See the terms and conditions regarding usage and rights.

plugins.name: Mode Match
plugins.description:
Mode Match lets you take a variable's value from one mode and apply it to other modes. Match a single variable, group of variables, or all variables in a collection!


  1. Select your multi-mode collection
  2. Select the source mode (copy from)
  3. Select the destination mode (copy to)
  4. Enter the path to a group of variables or a single variable (see below for bulk actions)
  5. Update ✨


Tip

  1. Keep your variable window open to see the changes.
  2. Use the Refresh button to pull in changes to the variables made when the plugin window is open. (see below for copy & paste)
  3. Use clear to quickly delete the path.


Bulk Actions

You will most likely want to run this on a group or the entire collection:

  1. Update all variables within a group by entering a path/to/group
  2. Update all variables in the collection by entering / @all or @root in the path input


Plugin Notes

  1. Collection list will only show collections with more than 1 mode
  2. Variable names and paths are case sensitive
  3. Updating variables, especially those linked to text styles may take longer to propagate


Supports

  1. All variable types (number, string, boolean, color)
  2. Aliasing
  3. Raw values


Copy/Paste Figma Bug

If you copy/paste variables between collections, you may need to reload the tab in order for those variables to register in their new collection.

plugins.description:
Плагин для управления статусами и задачами в макетах Figma. Разработан для оптимизации рабочего процесса.

Основные возможности:

  1. Быстрое управление статусами макетов: "В процессе", "На проверку", "Не актуально", "Готово"
  2. Привязка номеров задач к макетам с автоматическим созданием кликабельных ссылок
  3. Конвертация номеров задач [...] из названия фрейма в интерактивные ссылки
  4. Настраиваемый URL-шаблон для задач
  5. Поддержка статуса "Как на проде" для готовых макетов, сверенных с продом
  6. Автоматическое создание и обновление метаданных фрейма

Как использовать:

  1. Выберите фрейм
  2. Установите нужный статус
  3. Добавьте номера связанных задач
  4. Готово! Плагин автоматически создаст метаданные и настроит все связи

Для кого:

  1. Дизайнеры
  2. Разработчики
  3. Менеджеры проектов
  4. Команды, использующие Figma в рабочем процессе

Особенности:

  1. Интуитивно понятный интерфейс
  2. Быстрый доступ к часто используемым функциям
  3. Автоматическое сохранение настроек
  4. Поддержка горячих клавиш
plugins.tagline: 🚀 Простой способ связать макеты с задачами и управлять их статусами.

plugins.name: snapInsert
plugins.description:
snapInsert is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of searching filtering and adding component instances into your designs.

Perfect for designers and teams who work with large design systems, Component Filter helps you save time and maintain focus on your design tasks.


Key Features:

• Component Set Filtering: Easily filter components by their set names to focus on specific groups within your design system.

• Dynamic Key-Value Filtering: Use key-value pairs to narrow down your search and find exactly what you need based on component properties like size, orientation, or any custom attributes.

• Real-Time Results: As you apply filters, see immediate updates to the component list, ensuring you always have the most relevant components in view.

• Intuitive UI: The plugin features a clean, user-friendly interface that integrates seamlessly with Figma, making it easy to apply filters and manage your components.


Note:

Currently, Component Filter only searches for components within the file you are working on. In future releases, users will be able to search components from published design libraries, expanding the plugin's functionality to cover broader design systems.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly search and insert component instances from sets or singles into your designs.

plugins.name: Markdown Import
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---


This plugin lets you import markdown-style text into your Figma page directly from Google Docs, Notepad, or any markdown editor.


It automatically parses the structure of your content—such as # Heading 1, ## Heading 2, ### Heading 3, and body text —and allows you to assign custom components for each section during import.


【Key Features】

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component
plugins.tagline: マークダウンのテキストをコンポーネントを適用してインポート | Import markdown into Figma with component mapping.

plugins.name: Select by Style
plugins.description:
Select by Style makes it easy to find and select all elements on your page that share the same text or colour styling.


Perfect for designers who need to quickly audit styles, make bulk changes, or ensure consistency across their designs. Save time by selecting multiple elements at once instead of hunting them down individually.


What it does:

The plugin automatically scans your current page and organises all text styles and colour styles into easy-to-browse tables. Simply click on any style to instantly select all elements using that style across your page.


How to use it:

  1. Open the plugin to see all styles detected on your current page
  2. Browse the Text tab to see text styles with font details, sizes, and weights
  3. Browse the Colour tab to see colour styles with hex codes and opacity
  4. Use the search bar to quickly find specific styles by name, font, or colour
  5. Click any style row to select all elements using that style
  6. Use the Refresh button when you add new content to the page


Key features:

  1. Instant selection: Click once to select all elements with the same style
  2. Smart organisation: Separate tabs for text and colour styles with detailed information
  3. Search & filter: Quickly find styles by typing in the search box
  4. Library detection: See which styles are local vs. from external libraries
  5. Auto-refresh: Detects when you switch pages or add significant new content
  6. Live updates: Automatically updates when you change styles on selected elements


How are we doing? We're always working to make this plugin better and would genuinely appreciate hearing about your experience - and suggestions for enhancement.
plugins.tagline: Quickly select all elements using the same style

  2. Smart organisation: Separate tabs for text and colour styles with detailed information
  3. Search & filter: Quickly find styles by typing in the search box
  4. Library detection: See which styles are local vs. from external libraries
  5. Auto-refresh: Detects when you switch pages or add significant new content
  6. Live updates: Automatically updates when you change styles on selected elements


How are we doing? We're always working to make this plugin better and would genuinely appreciate hearing about your experience - and suggestions for enhancement.
136153.tagline: Quickly select all elements using the same style

plugins.name: Auto Layout Checker
plugins.description:
Auto Layout Checker helps you maintain design consistency by identifying and converting elements that don't use Auto Layout. Perfect for cleaning up designs and ensuring layout consistency across your files.


🔍 Key Features:

• Scan entire pages or selected elements for missing Auto Layout

• One-click conversion of frames and groups to Auto Layout

• Clear visual feedback for converted elements

• Theme-aware interface that matches your Figma theme

• Quick navigation to elements through direct selection


🎯 Perfect for:

• Design system cleanup and maintenance

• Legacy file modernization

• Team collaboration and consistency checks

• Quick Auto Layout implementation


💡 How to use:

1. Select elements to scan (or leave unselected to scan entire page)

2. Click "Scan" to find elements without Auto Layout

3. Click any element to navigate to it in your design

4. Use the "Convert" button to instantly apply Auto Layout


The plugin automatically applies sensible Auto Layout defaults:

• Vertical layout orientation

• 10px spacing between elements

• 10px padding on all sides

• Automatic sizing for both axes


Keep your designs maintainable and responsive with Auto Layout Checker!
plugins.tagline: Quickly find and convert elements missing Auto Layout, streamlining your design system consistency.

plugins.name: Version Linker
plugins.description:
Version Linker - Link and Manage Component Versions


A powerful version management plugin for Figma that helps you link and track different versions of your components across frames.


Key Features:

• Create Main Version Links (MVL) to establish version control points

• Add Secondary Version Links (SVL) to connect related components

• Navigate instantly between linked components

• Add descriptions to track changes and updates

• Customize version colors for better visual organization

• Manage versions with easy-to-use edit and delete functions


Perfect for:

• Design systems with multiple component versions

• Teams tracking component evolution

• Projects requiring version history

• Maintaining component relationships across frames


How it works:

1. Create an MVL with a version number and color

2. Add SVLs to connect related components in different frames

3. Add descriptions to document changes

4. Use the navigation buttons to quickly move between linked components


Stay organized and maintain clear version relationships in your Figma files with Version Linker.
plugins.tagline: managing version

plugins.name: Lehuye
plugins.description:
简介：

这款多功能插件专为设计师和开发者设计，旨在简化文本管理和矢量图形处理流程。通过提供一系列强大的文本操作功能，如一键提取、批量替换、精准筛选和灵活插入等，极大地提高了工作效率。此外，它还支持快速导出SVG代码及自动捕获当前窗口标题信息，使得项目整理更加便捷。


This versatile plugin is designed for designers and developers to simplify text management and vector graphics processing workflows. By providing a suite of powerful text manipulation features such as one-click extraction, batch replacement, precise filtering, and flexible insertion, it significantly boosts productivity. Additionally, it supports quick export of SVG code and automatic capture of the current window title information, making project organization more convenient.


このプラグインはデザイナーや開発者のためのツールで、テキスト管理とベクターグラフィックス処理を簡素化します。ワンクリックでのテキスト抽出、バッチ置換、特定の条件に基づくテキストフィルタリングなど、強力なテキスト操作機能により、作業効率が大幅に向上します。さらに、SVGコードのエクスポートや現在のウィンドウタイトル情報の自動取得もサポートしています。



功能作用说明


获取文本 / Extract Text


作用：允许用户一键提取设计中的所有文本内容，便于文案管理。


役割：デザイン内のすべてのテキストコンテンツをワンクリックで抽出でき、コピー管理を容易にします。


Function: Allows users to extract all text content in the design with one click, making copy management easier.


替换文本 / Replace Text


作用：支持批量替换文档中的指定文本，快速完成文案更新。


役割：ドキュメント内の指定されたテキストを一括で置換し、コピーの更新を迅速に完了します。


Function: Supports batch replacement of specific text in the document to quickly complete copy updates.


过滤文本 / Filter Text


作用：根据特定条件精准筛选文本，帮助用户聚焦关键内容。


役割：特定の条件に基づいてテキストを正確にフィルタリングし、ユーザーが重要なコンテンツに焦点を当てられるようにします。


Function: Precisely filters text based on specific conditions to help users focus on key content.


插入文本 / Insert Text


作用：允许灵活插入动态文本或占位符，优化设计流程。


役割：動的テキストやプレースホルダーを柔軟に挿入でき、デザインプロセスを最適化します。


Function: Allows flexible insertion of dynamic text or placeholders to optimize the design workflow.


获取 SVG 代码 / Get SVG Code


作用：快速导出矢量图形的SVG代码，便于开发使用。


役割：ベクターグラフィックスのSVGコードを迅速にエクスポートし、開発に利用しやすくします。


Function: Quickly exports SVG code for vector graphics, making it developer-friendly.


获取窗口标题 / Get Window Title


作用：自动捕获当前窗口的标题信息，方便项目整理。


役割：現在のウィンドウのタイトル情報を自動的に取得し、プロジェクト整理を便利にします。


Function: Automatically captures the current window title information, making project organization easier.
plugins.tagline: 乐乎也数字盒子
